modules.description: This module handles the core translation logic from command-line parsing structures to climate's internal representation, focusing on converting parser definitions into equivalent climate constructs. It operates on abstract syntax trees and parser configurations derived from cmdlang, transforming them into climate-compatible formats. Use cases include experimental integration testing and prototyping translation strategies for command-line interface definitions.

Translates command-line parsing structures from cmdlang into climate-compatible representations, handling parameters, arguments, and commands. It converts parser definitions into equivalent climate argument parsers and commands, enabling experimental integration between the two libraries. Use cases include prototyping command-line interface translations and testing cross-library compatibility.

Translates command-line parsing structures into climate-compatible representations, handling parameters, arguments, and commands. Converts parser definitions into equivalent climate argument parsers, supporting experimental integration between libraries. Useful for prototyping CLI translations and testing cross-library compatibility.
